hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] wanted to write to the Romans, but they (the Companions) said: 'They do not read any letter unless it has a seal.' So he took a ring of silver, and it is as if I can see its whiteness on his hand, and on it were engraved (the words): "Muhammad Rasul Allah (Muhammad the Messenger of Allah)

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ خَاتَمِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: Description of the Ring of the Prophet (ﷺ) [ﷺ]
